summary: The Beatles were a super popular English rock band from the 1960s. They were from Liverpool and consisted of John Lennon, Paul McCartney, George Harrison, and Ringo Starr. The Beatles' music was unique, blending rock 'n' roll, classical, and other styles. They were pioneers in the music industry, changing how records were made and marketed. Their songs were huge hits, and they had a massive impact on youth culture. The band's success led to movies, business ventures, and solo careers after they split up. They remain one of the most famous and influential bands ever.
title: The Beatles
